title: Baby Cow Organics typeface
content:
Hi there,

does anyone recognise the rounded face ’Baby Cow Organics’ is set in? I recall Durex using it as well.

Sorry for the small image - it’s the best i can get...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110138im_/http:/typophile.com/files/164938_5511.jpeg)

thanks in advance.
author: mrpink

comments.content: thanks for the quick reply - spot on!
